components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: The issue causing an increase in error 63013 when using the Verify API with the WhatsApp channel has been identified. Our team is actively working on a fix that is targeted for deployment tomorrow morning Mountain Daylight Time (MDT). We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating an increase in error 63013 when using the Verify API with the WhatsApp channel. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating an increase in error 63013 when using the Verify API with the WhatsApp channel. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are investigating an increase in error 63013 when using the Verify API with the WhatsApp channel. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Verify WhatsApp. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

components.name: Verify

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failure to Airtel Network in Niger

incident_updates.body: We have identified SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to Airtel Network in Niger. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures From Denmark Mobile Networks to a Subset of Twilio's Denmark Long Codes

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with inbound delivery failures. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 October 2023 at 02:00 PDT until 24 October 2023 at 06:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US handsets via a subset of US short code.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 October 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada.

Verify Silent Network Auth
Lookup Identity Match
Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 30 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
04 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 04 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
09 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 09 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
11 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 11 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
16 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 16 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
18 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 18 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
23 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
25 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
30 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 30 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
